com.smartitengineering.version.impl.jgit.service
Interface MetaRCSService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MetaRCSServiceImpl
public interface MetaRCSService

The API for alternate storage access of versioning meta info. It will be used in conjunction with Various RCS Implementations. Its basic intention is to make search easier and faster.

Author:
imyousuf

saveResources

void saveResources(Commit commit)

getVersionsForResource

java.lang.String[] getVersionsForResource(java.lang.String resourceId)
Get all version ids of the resource denoted by resource id.

Parameters:
resourceId - The resource of which versions are to be retrieved
Returns:
Descendending sorted versions, that is HEAD at index 0

getHeadVersionForResource

Parameters:

Returns:
